name: Squirrel Jump (itch) (Boogygames Studios)
description:
Play as the Squirrel in this endless running 2D game. Filled with excitement and fun, this game will entertain you a lot.
Run, dash, and jump your way through the forest, waterfalls, caves and other challenging terrains! The best endless runner game! Unlock your favorite Squirrel and get ready to run.

FEATURE:

• Collect dozens of rare and unique Squirrels
• Play as every Squirrel you unlock
• 2D graphics with many beautiful effects
• Easy controller by mouse
• Shop system
• Easy to learn

How To Play :
• Hold left mouse button to jump higher
• Dodge obstacles & enemies
• Collect nuts
